Peter Jones, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ MC Shy D, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe na Bronx, New York. Ọ bịanyere aka na Luke Skyywalker Records ma wepụta abọm abụọ, Got to Be Tough na Comin' Correct na 88, site na akara ahụ site na 1987 ruo 1988. O weputara abọm nke atọ ya, Don't Sweat Me, na 1990 site na On Top Records na Benz Records, na abọm ya nké anọ, The Comeback, na 1993 site na Wrap Records. N'afọ 1996, Jones wepụtara abọm studio ya nke ise, Recordnize, nke gosipụtara DJ Smurf n'okpuru Benz Records. E wepụtara abọm ya nke isii na nke kachasị ọhụrụ, Against the Odds, na 1999 na Charlotte 'Tha Rhythum' Crooms, kwa site na Benz Records.
Shy D nde $ 1.6 na ụgwọ ọrụ gárá aga na mmebi ntaramahụhụ site n'aka onye na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Luther Campbell
Shy D kwuru na Campbell ji ya ụgwọ site na Gotta Be Tough and Comin' Correct na '88, abọm abụọ o dekọrọ n'okpuru ákàrà ndekọ Campbell, Luke Records, na ngwụcha afọ 1980.
